comments.author: Renan C

comments.text:
Quebrar Câmbio?   Tem outra desculpa ai??  Não estamos falando de carro 
nacional não.  E sim de carro Japonês que no Brasil e no mundo tem muita 
fama de resistência..  O 911 realmente é um carro top anda muito.. A 
diferença entre eles fica a a cargo do piloto.. Agora presta atenção.. O 
recorde de Nürburgring é do GTR em sua categoria .. GTR é papa 
superesportivo.. Goodzila.. se ele for para pista com um piloto que saiba, 
bate o recorde sem problemas, pouca diferença mais bate. Em um circuito o 
GTR vence. Em arrancada vai depender quem sair primeiro.  Seu cambio e 
tração 4x4 é imbatível em circuito.
comments.author: sergio cintra

captions.text: Today here in 'Fast Lap' a new type of car
A mix of a coupé and sedan, but always very strong
560 hp and an unique sensation, because is a car
that accelerates well and have good stability
So, 'Fast Lap' today have a strong competitor to try to be in front of the table
And Audi is very known about traction
Is this car stable?
Let's see
Let's go!
Here, Rubinho
What do you think about this type of body?
It started in A7, after S7 and now RS7
Do you like it? A bit coupé, a bit sedan...
I like the cars station wagan. Big cars...
With the rear high and a great trunk
Because I wanna a powerful car but I don't wanna have to take out my family of the game
So, I have a powerful car and the space to have my family with me
I guess this car will beat in stability what I have nowadays
I have a RS6 2010, that I know very well
You know very well Audi, they are famous by traction, they work a lot on this
Since the rally in the 70s and 80s
By your experience with the Audis
What you can say about traction?
For me, the lines of this kind of car are the things that I love
You feel the smoothness in the project
I like this kind of cars because of security and sportsmanship
And is a brand that have a good history, arrived in Brazil by the hands of Ayrton, and...
And now you are very fast!
Out of voice?
No voice!
And what I said about traction you can feel here
Yeah, have traction, power... everything
Do you think is a good bet to be in first place in our ranking?
I will turn on every sportive mode to see how this one can go
But, yeah, we have a great chance to dispute the top of the ranking
By what I felt in that turn and in the uphill there
Yeah, was great that you stopped talking
Yeah, so now flat out here!
'Fast Lap with Rubens Barrichello'
The RS7 surprised us. With over 70 kg of torque and the quattro traction were the difference
And the Audi nearly took the lead of our ranking
This car accelerates very well
560 hp, it's a sensational power
But the car understeers a little bit
We are again in that question 'security x speed'
A car that understeers is always more safe, but in a track it is not so good
That's it

title: AUDI RS7 - VOLTA RÁPIDA #10 COM RUBENS BARRICHELLO | ACELERADOS
